pr_title: Fix #5880: getConvertedValue now takes Object instead of String

timeline.message: Fix #5880: getConvertedValue now takes Object instead of String

timeline.bodyText: You could use String submittedValue = Objects.toString(value, null); and also, make the change for every caller? (e.g EditorRenderer, SelectCheckboxMenu, etc.)
timeline.author: Rapster
